name: Garfield's Armageddon Delusion
description:
Garfield's Armageddon Delusion is a horror-esque game that revolves around the player being trapped in a maze, with many surprises lurking around every corner. Please note that this game has some loud noises. With items scattered around, and weird entities just waiting for their chance to strike, who knows what you could find!

It has...

  • 3 Unique Endings
  • Items to Collect!
  • Multiple, game-affecting choices!
  • LOTS of different twists and turns! A huge maze!
  • Eerie, ambient background noises

The future of this world rests in your hands! Will you save it, or join the dark side?

You may not know 'til you.. remember.
developers: Two Makes One of a Kind
